text: "Worried About You" is a song by The Rolling Stones. It is the seventh track from their 1981 album Tattoo You. It was written by Mick Jagger and Keith Richards and first produced around 1974 and 1975 for the album Black and Blue and was left off the album. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:The Rolling Stones songs
title: Worried About You
